Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of a man named Bakenmut, with painted detail; a black lappet-wig, a modelled face with black eyes, crossed arms in relief holding two black hoes, the front of the leg-section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs, the back is decorated with a representation of a black seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
